slides.title: Identity from the <highlight>first day of life</highlight>
slides.text: At XILO we are developing a neonatal biometric system based on plantar prints to ensure every newborn has a unique, secure and accessible identity.

slides.title: Security <highlight>from the start</highlight>
slides.text: Every newborn has a reliable identity, registered under international standards.

slides.title: Accessible <highlight>technology</highlight>
slides.text: Our system is designed for hospitals around the world, making implementation easy.

slides.alt: Neonatology corridor at La Fe Hospital
slides.title: Clinic and <highlight>technology</highlight>, hand in hand
slides.text: The combination of La Fe Hospital’s medical expertise and UPV’s technological development drives an innovative neonatal identification system.
